title: Twitter allows pinning tweets at the top of profile on iOS and Android devices
text:
Twitter has released a new feature that allows the users to pin tweets to their profile on iOS and Android.
According to The Next Web, the pinned tweets stay at the top of the user’s profile, no matter the time. It is a useful feature if they made some important tweet but do not want it to get buried under the wave of all their newest tweets.
To try it, all the users need to do is open up the specific tweet, then click on the menu button and select ‘Pin to your profile.’
All you need to do is open up the specific tweet, click on the menu button, and select “Pin to your profile.” Roll-out is gradual so you’ll have to be a bit patient if it hasn’t made its way to your device yet.
